name: You Are Sick
description:
WARNING

This can make you very sick so play at your own risk!

- Expect 20-60 minutes of gameplay.

Gameplay


You will parkour in a huge abandoned city with wobbly controls to try to escape it.
Players must navigate their way around using parkour techniques. The city is filled with obstacles and challenges, and the player's mission is to explore every corner of it, uncovering hidden secrets and treasures along the way.

The camera controls in the game are intentionally wobbly, adding to the immersive experience of being an urban explorer in a city that has long been forgotten. Players will feel as if they are right there in the game, with the camera swaying and tilting as they leap over gaps, climb up walls, and run along narrow ledges.

Story

You will find yourself...
